project_name: Deploying and Integrating Kubeflow on AWS EKS
description: The goal of this project was to deploy Kubeflow on Amazon EKS, manage machine learning pipelines, and integrate MLflow for enhanced model tracking and experimentation.

technologies_used.name: Kubeflow
technologies_used.description: A platform for deploying, monitoring, and managing machine learning models on Kubernetes.

technologies_used.name: AWS EKS
technologies_used.description: A managed Kubernetes service on AWS for deploying containerized applications.

technologies_used.name: MLflow
technologies_used.description: An open-source platform for managing the complete machine learning lifecycle, including experiment tracking and model management.

technologies_used.name: Kubernetes
technologies_used.description: An open-source platform for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

technologies_used.name: Cloud Infrastructure
technologies_used.description: Experience in managing cloud-based infrastructure, specifically on AWS.

technologies_used.name: CI/CD
technologies_used.description: Knowledge of continuous integration and continuous deployment for automating software delivery processes.

infrastructure.name: AWS EKS Cluster
infrastructure.description: The Kubernetes cluster was deployed on AWS EKS with two worker nodes and required configurations for service management.
steps: Set up IAM roles and permissions

infrastructure.name: Juju Setup
infrastructure.description: Deployed Juju for managing Kubernetes applications, particularly for deploying Kubeflow and MLflow.
steps: Installed Juju and bootstrapped it to the EKS cluster
Registered the cluster and created necessary namespaces

skills_required.name: Cloud Infrastructure Management
skills_required.description: Expertise in setting up and managing AWS resources, particularly EKS.

skills_required.name: Kubernetes
skills_required.description: Proficiency in deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters with kubectl and eksctl.

skills_required.name: MLflow and Kubeflow Integration
skills_required.description: Experience in integrating MLflow for experiment tracking with Kubeflow.

skills_required.name: Juju Framework
skills_required.description: Knowledge of deploying applications on Kubernetes with the Juju framework.

skills_required.name: CI/CD Pipelines for ML
skills_required.description: Familiarity with automating ML model deployment and management using Kubernetes-based platforms like Kubeflow.

challenges_faced.name: Cluster Access and Permissions
challenges_faced.description: Ensuring proper IAM roles and permissions were configured for managing the AWS EKS cluster and services.

outcomes.name: Successful Deployment of Kubeflow and MLflow
outcomes.description: Kubeflow and MLflow were successfully deployed and integrated into the AWS EKS environment, allowing for enhanced model tracking and experimentation.

outcomes.name: Streamlined Machine Learning Workflow
outcomes.description: MLflow was integrated with Kubeflow notebooks for efficient machine learning experiment tracking and management.
